Technique: BURNED, OXIDIZED; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; PAINTED; ENGOBE
Name: Jug
Description: Globular jug with narrow mouth, flat projecting rim and somewhat unstable base. Paste of a reddish colour and surface with burnished coating. The piece bears a painted decoration in a dark wine-red colour based on bands encircling the body. In the upper third a handle can be observed.
